TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SeekableXPathNavigator extends System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator
Public MustInherit Class SeekableXPathNavigator Inherits XPathNavigator
public ref class SeekableXPathNavigator abstract : System::Xml::XPath::XPathNavigator

summary.span: 提供對 XML 文件所包含資料的唯讀隨機存取，並讓您可以對指定的節點進行有效率的查詢。

span.span: Provides read-only, random access to data contained in XML documents and enables efficient querying for specified nodes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 系統的組件之間傳遞的 SOAP 訊息是由各種元件的系統必須檢查這些訊息，以判斷要在處理它們所採取的動作處理。The SOAP messages passed between parts of the Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) system are handled by various components of the system that must inspect these messages to determine what actions to take in processing them. XPath 引擎就是據此目的而負責查詢訊息的元件，而您需要使用導覽才能讀取 SOAP 訊息和其他 XML 文件。The XPath engine is a component that queries messages for this purpose and it requires a navigator to read SOAP messages and other XML documents. 導覽會提供游標，這個游標會從節點移動至節點，並追蹤 XML 文件實際被讀取的位置。A navigator provides a cursor that moves from node to node tracking where the XML document is actually being read. XPath 引擎會使用 ，這個類別會加入 屬性來擴充 類別。The XPath engine works with a , which extends the class by adding a property. 這個屬性允許儲存 XML 文件中的位置並迅速將其載入，而不需要複製 (Clone) 導覽；此類作業對 而言，是非常耗費資源的記憶體配置。This property allows positions within the XML document to be saved and loaded quickly without having to clone the navigator, an expensive memory allocation that the requires for such an operation. 為了讓 針對訊息處理提供重要的最佳化效果，XPath 引擎必須經常記錄游標在 XML 文件查詢執行過程中的位置。The XPath engine must frequently record the position of the cursor in the course of executing queries on XML documents, so the provides an important optimization for message processing. 請注意， 屬性的值是特定實作專用的，因此不會對應至節點位置或字元位置。Note that the value of the property is implementation-specific and may not map to node position or character position. 它只對提供此值的 實作 (和執行個體) 具有意義。Its value is only meaningful to the implementation (and instance) that supplied it.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，傳回一個值來描述兩個已指定位置的文件順序。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns a value that describes the document order of the two specified positions.

returns.span: 其中一個 值，它會描述 與 在文件中的關聯。

span.span: One of the values that describes the relation of to in the document.
or is not valid.

para.span: 這個方法應該對無效的位置值擲回例外狀況。

span.span: This method should throw an exception for invalid position values.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得或設定與節點相關聯的值，而此節點位於 XPath 導覽所在位置的資料中。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets a value associated with the node in the data where the XPath navigator is positioned.

value.span: 導覽的目前位置相關聯的值。

span.span: A value that is associated with the navigator's current position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `set` 作業會將導覽移動至與指定值相關聯的位置。The `set` operation moves the navigator to the position associated with the value specified. `get` 作業會傳回與目前導覽所在位置相關聯的值。The `get` operation returns a value associated with the current position of the navigator.

para.span: 此屬性沒有任何實質意義： 它是不透明實作將與導覽的目前位置相關聯的值。

span.span: This property does not have any intrinsic meaning: it is an opaque value that an implementation associates with the navigator's current position.

para.span: 這個值本身並沒有任何限制或需求。

span.span: No restrictions or requirements are placed on the value itself.

para.span: 您也不必臆測它會有什麼內部資料結構。

span.span: No assumptions about its internal data structure can be made.

para.span: 這些值並不用循序排列，而且導覽位置也不一定要對應至唯一值。

span.span: It is not required that the values be sequential, or even that a navigator position map to a unique value.

para.span: 多個值可以參考相同的導覽位置，因此拿兩個值進行比較不會提供有用的資訊。

span.span: Multiple values can refer to the same navigator position, so comparing two values does not provide useful information.

para.span: 作業提供的任何值必須對 作業有效。

span.span: Any value supplied by a operation must be valid for a operation.

para.span: 作業使用不是最初由 作業取得的值，不一定會產生錯誤。

span.span: It is not necessarily an error for a operation to use a value not first acquired by a operation.

para.span: 不是由 傳回的值 (而是透過其他某種方式取得)，不一定會被實作視為有效：這項選擇性是由實作器決定。

span.span: A value not returned by that has been acquired some other way may or may not be considered valid by the implementation: this choice is up to the implementer.

para.span: 在某值的導覽巡覽同一份文件的期間，不可以變更該值的意義。

span.span: The meaning of a value must not change during the life of its navigator while it navigates the same document.

para.span: 此外，任何因複製而相關聯的兩個導覽也必須共用該值的意義，同樣地，條件是它們仍在巡覽同一份文件時。

span.span: Also, the meaning of values must be shared by any two navigators that are related by cloning, again, provided they still navigate the same document.

para.span: 只要執行個體仍然在巡覽相同文件，由 作業提供的所有值在導覽及其任何複製項的存留期限內一定會保持有效。

span.span: All values supplied by a operation must remain valid for the life of a navigator and any of its clones as long as the instance still navigates the same document.
